nodes.text: Danteel City Police was a law enforcement agency that operated in Danteel City on the planet Danteel during the reign of the Galactic Empire. At some point during the Galactic Civil War, the Danteel City Police investigated the murder of the Devaronian noble Carisica Vanq, and the police officer Lieutenant Stenberk arrested the Human Darim Chumu in the High Card Casino on suspicion of committing the crime.
